text: so amazon ads is providing solutions for
uh brands and business owners at amazon
to vend out their marketing uh solutions
to to to achieve their advertising goals
our homecode solutions were built on um
on outside technologies on open source
technologies and things on those lines
but they would not scale horizontally
our business seemed to be boxed in a box
away solutions
give us the opportunity to scale
horizontally to be event oriented we
moved our traditional databases to
dynamodb which was backed further by
elasticsearch for all the listing and
filtering queries for our ad servers we
had to build high scale caching
solutions these caching solutions went
up to 500 million keys being read per
second
the network being used was about 1.2
terabytes per second for our data lakes
and data warehousing systems we were
storing hundreds of petabytes of data
and analyzing them over large emr
clusters uh backed by apache spark all
this data was gems and jewels for our
machine learning system as well the
advertisers are now able to know their
reports how their ads are performing in
near real time our shoppers are excited
because their uh
relevance for the ads that are being
shown to them has increased manifolds
more than 10x the 3p api providers are
also phenomenally benefited by this
because the api latencies are much lower
the availability is much higher it's
just benefit to all of them
[Music]
